page.title: 05HOBBIES IN THE KINNEFF AREA
page.content: There is a wide range of{hobbies}in our area. There are hobbies from cycling to wind_surfing,knitting to travelling and football to flower_arranging.The most popular hobbies are{cycling, gardening, {knitting, reading and swimming.}The quiet country roads and emphasis on fitness make cycling popular. Almost every house has a garden so naturally people spend their spare time there growing both flowers and vegetables.Knitting has always been popular with rural women. Although there is no library in Kinneff,a mobile library comes once a week to the village. There is no swimming pool in Kinneff but the local people have the choice of travelling to Montrose or Stonehaven to heated indoor swimming pools. Most people spend some time each day watching television.
